mapper.insert: insert into employee (username, realname, password, tel, email, dept_id, input_time, state, admin) values (#{username}, #{realname}, #{password}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{dept.id}, #{inputTime}, #{state}, #{admin})
mapper.update: update employee set username = #{username}, realname = #{realname}, password = #{password}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email}, dept_id = #{dept.id}, input_time = #{inputTime}, state = #{state}, admin = #{admin} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, username, realname, password, tel, email, dept_id, input_time, state, admin from employee where id = #{id}
select id, username, realname, password, tel, email, dept_id, input_time, state, admin from employee
